titleStmt.title: The commons complaint VVherein is contained tvvo speciall grieuances: The first, the generall destruction and waste of woods in this kingdome, with a remedy for the same: also how to plant wood according tyo the nature of euery soyle, without losse of any ground; and how thereby many more and better cattel may be yeerely bred, with the charge and profit that yeerely may arise thereby. The second grieuance is, the extreme dearth of victuals. Fovre remedies for the same. ...
titleStmt.author: Standish, Arthur, fl. 1611-1613.

The second grieuance is, the extreme dearth of victuals. Fovre remedies for the same. ...

notesStmt.note: Includes folding cut of a fowl house.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
